rukus.text: 37|139|haey pitabrakd nasa  you nou sa kuchea anakneasar mneak knong  chamnaom anakneasar teanglay .
37|140|( chaur changcha) nowpel delke ban rtkech chaul tow knong  saampow del penh daoy bantouk .
37|141|kraoyomk ke ban phsaangsaamnang  pelnoh ke ka sthet knong  chamnaom anak del chanh knong kar phsaangsaamnang( daoy trauv ke baoh chaul  tow knong samoutr) .
37|142|ruochamk trei da thom muoy ban leb ke  khn delke kuchea anak  del trauv ke sdeibantosa .
37|143|dau che  neah  pitabrakd nasa brasenbae ke minmen chea anak  del sthet knongchamnaom anak del sarsaer leuk t meu  k ng yeung te noh
37|144|ke brakadchea sthetnow knong poh trei da thom noh  rhautadl thngai  delke thveu aoy rsa chenhpi phnaur laengvinh( thngai barlok) .
37|145|haey yeung ban baoh ke towleu dei veal  del kmeanoavei saoh  haey ke sthet knong pheap mean chomngu .
37|146|haey yeung ban bandoh daem roukkhcheate muoy daem chea braphet  daem lpow( chea mlob) samreab ke .
37|147|haey yeung ban banhchoun ke towkean krom mnoussa del mean  chamnuon muoy ry pean neak  ryy chraenchang nih .
37|148|kraoyomk  puokke mean chomnue  ruoch yeung banaoy puokke  saoysokh( knong karorsanow) rhautadl pelkamnt .
37|149|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat) suor puokke( areab mea kkah)  tha  tae kaunosrei samreab mcheasa robsa anak  haey kaunobrosa samreab  puokke ryy
37|150|ryy muoy yeung ban bangkeut mea la ai kat chea phet srei daoy  puokke meulkheunh( tha dauchnaoh) ryy
37|151|chaur doeng tha  pitabrakd nasa  knongchamnaom peakyasaamdei  bradit phout kohk robsa puokke  ku puokke niyeay tha
37|152|a l laoh ban bangkeut kaun .  haey pitabrakd nasa  puokke kuchea puok del phout kohk .
37|153|tae hetoaveibeanchea trong chreusareusa yk kaunosrei(leuk  tamkeung) cheang kaunobrosa towvinh
37|154|tae mean avei kaetlaeng champoh puok anak ban chea puok anak sa nni- dthan bebnih
37|155|dau che  neah  tae puok anak min pichearna te ryy
37|156|ryy muoy puok anak mean phosdo tang banhcheak chbasaleasa
37|157|dau che  neah  chaur puok anak noam kompir robsa puok anak mk brasenbae  puok anakchea anak del niyeay pitmen noh .

37|158|haey puokke( mou sh ri ki n) ban chattouk rveang trong  ning chin  chea sachnheate nungoknea .  haey chea karpit nasa  chin ban doeng tha puokke  pitchea nung trauv ke bramoulophdom( now thngai barlok) .
37|159|a l laoh mha saatasam ampi avei del puokke niyeay  bradit phout kohk .
37|160|leuklengte banda khnhom robsa a l laoh del mean chetd smaoh  trang bonnaoh .
37|161|proh pitabrakd nasa  puok anak ning avei del puok anak  korp sakkar
37|162|ku puok anak minmen chea anak del ach thveu aoy norna mneak  v nge  v ng ban laey .
37|163|leuklengte anaknea del chea anak chaul nork cheu hi m  bonnaoh .
37|164|haey( mea la ai kat ban pol tha) kmean anaknea mneak  knongchamnaom puok yeung  leuklengte ke mean kanleng delke kamnt  ruoch chea se  r ch bonnaoh .
37|165|haey pitabrakd nasa  puok yeung kuchea anak del chhr chea  chuor ( knong karkorp sakkar champoh a l laoh) .
37|166|haey pitabrakd nasa  puok yeung kuchea anak del sarsaer  leukatamkeung a l laoh .
37|167|haey pitabrakd nasa  puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n) thleab ban  niyeay tha
37|168|pitabrakd nasa  brasenbae puok yeung mean kompir dauch puok chomnean moun mean noh
37|169|puok yeung pitchea nung klaycha khnhom robsa a l laoh del  mean chetd smaohtrang minkhan .
37|170|te( nowpel delke ban banhchouh kompir kuor an mk) puok  ke bercha ban bdeseth nung vea towvinh .  dau che  neah  puokke kngte nung doeng .
37|171|haey chea karpit nasa  peakyasaamdei( karosanyea)robsa  yeung ban sa me  r ch ruoch chea se  r ch samreab banda khnhom robsa yeung del chea  anakneasar .
37|172|pitabrakd nasa  puokke nung trauv ke chuoy .
37|173|haey pitabrakd nasa  teahean robsa yeung kuchea anak  del ttuol ban chokchy .
37|174|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat) ber chenhpi puokke muoy ry  pel .
37|175|haey chaur anak aoy puokke meulchoh  puokke kngte nung kheunh ( tearounakamm) cheaminkhan .
37|176|dau che  neah  tae puokke som aoy tearounakamm robsa yeung thleak mk leu  puokke phleam  ryy
37|177|haey nowpel del tearounakamm ban thleak towleu tithlea  lomnow dthan robsa puokke  kar vineasa robsa puok del trauv ke promean noh  ku akrak bamphot .
37|178|haey chaur anak( mou ham meat) ber chenhpi puokke muoy  rypel sen choh .
37|179|haey chaur anak aoy puokke meulchoh  puokke kngte nung kheunh ( tearounakamm) cheaminkhan .
37|180|mcheasa robsa anak mha saatasam  chea mcheasa mha khpangkhpasa ampi  avei del puokke niyeay bradit .
37|181|haey saum sokh sa ndi pheap kaetmean dl banda anakneasar .
37|182|haey real kar sarsaer ku champoh a l laoh chea mcheasa krob  krong piphp teangoasa .
